# BinaryFormatter Migration Guide

> Guidance for migrating away from the obsolete BinaryFormatter to safer alternatives.

**CAUTION:** We strongly recommend against using BinaryFormatter due to associated security risks. Existing users should migrate away from BinaryFormatter.

- [BinaryFormatter migration guide](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/serialization/binaryformatter-migration-guide/index.md): This guide covers the deprecation and removal of BinaryFormatter from .NET and recommends migration paths.
- [BinaryFormatter migration guide: Compatibility Package](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/serialization/binaryformatter-migration-guide/compatibility-package.md): Using the BinaryFormatter compatibility package.
- [BinaryFormatter migration guide: Choose a serializer](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/serialization/binaryformatter-migration-guide/choose-a-serializer.md): Compare the capabilities and trade-offs of serializers to choose a replacement for BinaryFormatter.
- [BinaryFormatter migration guide: Functionality reference](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/serialization/binaryformatter-migration-guide/functionality-reference.md): A reference for BinaryFormatter's functionality that may need to be considered during migrations.
- [BinaryFormatter migration guide: Migrate to DataContractSerializer (XML)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/serialization/binaryformatter-migration-guide/migrate-to-datacontractserializer.md): Migrate from BinaryFormatter to DataContractSerializer for XML serialization.
- [BinaryFormatter migration guide: Migrate to MessagePack (binary)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/serialization/binaryformatter-migration-guide/migrate-to-messagepack.md): Migrate from BinaryFormatter to MessagePack for binary serialization.
- [BinaryFormatter migration guide: Migrate to protobuf-net (binary)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/serialization/binaryformatter-migration-guide/migrate-to-protobuf-net.md): Migrate from BinaryFormatter to protobuf-net for binary serialization.
- [BinaryFormatter migration guide: Migrate to System.Text.Json (JSON)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/serialization/binaryformatter-migration-guide/migrate-to-system-text-json.md): Migrate from BinaryFormatter to System.Text.Json for JSON serialization.
- [BinaryFormatter migration guide: Read BinaryFormatter (NRBF) payloads](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/serialization/binaryformatter-migration-guide/read-nrbf-payloads.md): Safely read payloads created by BinaryFormatter in '.NET Remoting: Binary Format (NRBF).'
- [BinaryFormatter migration guide: WinForms apps](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/serialization/binaryformatter-migration-guide/winforms-applications.md): Learn about the effects of the deprecation and removal of BinaryFormatter from .NET on Windows Forms and how to migrate.
- [BinaryFormatter migration guide: WinForms and WPF OLE guidance](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/serialization/binaryformatter-migration-guide/winforms-wpf-ole-guidance.md): Learn about the effects of the deprecation and removal of BinaryFormatter from .NET on clipboard and drag-and-drop operations in Windows Forms and Windows Presentation Foundation.
- [BinaryFormatter migration guide: WPF apps](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/serialization/binaryformatter-migration-guide/wpf-applications.md): Learn about the effects of the deprecation and removal of BinaryFormatter from .NET on WPF and how to migrate.
